title: Run on 2025-06-14
description: A steady recovery run midweek, focusing on maintaining aerobic effort with moderate pacing consistency.
detailedDescription: Today's 4.21 km run completed in 24:08 with a pace of 5:44 per km aligns well with the predicted 5K time of 28:40, indicating solid aerobic conditioning. The pacing variance of ±14 sec/km shows moderately consistent pacing, which is commendable but suggests there is room to maintain even steadier splits in future sessions. With an elevation gain of 16.4 m and climb rate of 3.9 m/km, the course had some mild incline, adding a modest challenge. The effort score of 352 reflects a controlled aerobic effort appropriate for a recovery run. Since it’s Wednesday, typically a recovery day, the performance aligns well with the goal of maintaining aerobic base without excessive fatigue. Moving forward, focusing on reducing pacing variability and continuing to build aerobic endurance will help improve consistency and race preparedness.
